net.antidot.api.search

Class FacetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.api.search.FacetHelper

  • public class FacetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to access main facet data from Antidot search engine reply.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • FacetHelper

        public FacetHelper(Facet facetPb,
           FacetRegistry facetRegistry,
           QueryCoder queryCoder,
           Query query)
        Constructs facet helper from Google protobuf.

        You should never need to create such object directly. This is managed by parent helper (see ReplySetHelper).

        Parameters:
        facetPb - [in] one protobuf facet.
        facetRegistry - [in] registry of all configured facets. Appropriate facet is retrieved from the registry and later used to generate links.
        queryCoder - [in] coder used to generate links.
        query - [in] query corresponding to current result page. It is also used to generate links.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when facet identifier has not been registered to facet registry.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Retrieves facet identifier.
        Returns:
        identifier of the facet.

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Retrieves facet label.

        Empty String is returned when no label has been defined for the facet.

        When multiple labels are available, only the first one is retrieved. This can happen when labels are set for different localizations and no filter has been applied on any language through afs:lang filter.

        Returns:
        label of the facet.

      • getValues

        public java.util.List<FacetValueHelperInterface> getValues()
        Retrieves facet values.
        Returns:
        all values of the facets.

      • getLink

        public java.lang.String getLink(java.lang.String value)
                         throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Retrieves link for result page filtered on specified facet value.

        Exact filtering depends on current query and facet configuration.

        Parameters:
        value - [in] value of the facet to filter on (see FacetValueHelperInterface.getKey()
        Returns:
        appropriate link page.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - cannot generate link (should not happen).

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet(java.lang.String value)
        Checks whether specific facet value is set.
        Parameters:
        value - [in] value to check.
        Returns:
        true when requested value is set for the facet, false otherwise.
